title: Introduction to Examples
desc: An introduction describing the format of MUQ's examples.

title: Explanation of C++ Examples
desc: An introductory example describing how MUQ uses IPython to construct c++ examples.

title: Simple one input model components
desc: This is basic example demonstrating how to create a one input model components by creating a child of OneInputNoDerivModPiece.  The example is written in Python and uses a simple predator prey ODE for illustration.

title: Basic transport map construction
desc: This example provides an initial overview of how to construct a transport map using samples of a target distribution.

title: Multiscale Inference
desc: An illustration of multiscale Bayesian inference using transport maps.  Transport maps are used to decouple the coarse and fine scales while MCMC is used to sample the coarse posterior.
